verses.content: Chun, a inchûktir sâwm le pahnihai chu a ko a, anni hnawt dawk theina dingin khawhri inthiengnawhai chunga thuneina a pêk a; damnawna tinrêng le natna tinrêng sukdam theina dingin thuneina a pêk bawk a.
Tirko sâwm le pahni hai hming chu hieng hi an nih: A hmasataka chun Simon (Peter an ti) le a unau Andri hai, Zebedai naupa Jakob le a unaupa Johan hai;
Philip le Bartholomai hai; Thoma le siedâwltu Matthai hai; Alphai naupa Jakob le Thaddai hai,
Kanaana mi Simon le a inman- tirtu Juda Iskariot hai hi an nih.
Chuong sâwm le pahni hai chu Isûn a tir suok a, an kuomah thu a pêk a: “Jentailhai lampuiah fe naw unla, Samari mihai khuo hrim hrima khawm lût naw ro;
amiruokchu, Israel hnam berâm inhmanghai kuoma chun fe lem ro.
Chun, in fein, ‘vân ram chu a hung hnai tah,’ tiin hril pei ro.
Damnawhai sukdam unla, mithi- hai keitho unla, phârhai sukthieng unla, khawhrihai hnawt dawk ro, a thlâwnin in hmuh a, a thlâwnin pe ro.
In kâwngkhihaiah rângkachak tangka amanih, tangka manih, dâr tangka amanih chawi naw ro.
Inzinna dingin mansa amanih, zakuo pahni amanih, kekawk amanih, hmawl amani khawm chawi naw ro; sinthawtu chu a fâk ding hmu tlâk a ni sih a.
“Chun, khaw liena manih, khaw chîna manih, in lûtna taphawta chun ân tlungtir tlâk ding cheu mi zawng dawk unla, in suok nâwk hmakhat chutaka chun tlung zing ro.
Chun, ina chun in lût dingin chibai bûk ro.
Chun, ina mihai chu intlungtir tlâk cheu an ni chun, in thlamuongna thu chu an chungah tlung sienla; an tlâk naw ruok chun in thlamuongna thu chu in chungah hung kîr nâwk raw se.
Chun, tukhawm lâwm lo cheu a, in thu khawm ngai naw taphawt chu, chu ina inthawka manih, chu khuoa inthawka manih in suok pha chun in kephaa pilvut chu thin thla ro;
Titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, ngaituo nia chun chu khuohai nêk chun Sodom le Gomorra ram tuor ding chu a dân um lem a tih.
“Ngai ta u, satenehai laia berâm um angin ka tir cheu hi; chuongchun, rûl anga vara, vaṭhu anga pawi tâwkloin um unla.
Nisienlakhawm, mihriem lai chun fimkhur ro, rorêltuhai an in- mantir ding cheu a ni sih a, in- khâwmna inahai vuong an ti cheu a;
anih, hotuhai le lalhai hmaah annihai le Jentailhai inhriettirna dingin, keima leiin la ṭhuoi an ti cheu.
Nisienlakhawm, an inmantir pha cheu khawm, ‘Iengtin am, ieng thu am ka hril ding?’ tiin lungkham naw ro; in hril ding chu a hun taka chun ân hriettir ding cheu a ni sih a.
A hriltu chu nangni in ni âwm si nawh a, in Pa Thlarau nangnia thu hriltu khan a hril lem ding a nih.
“Chun, sukhlum dingin unaupa le unaupa inmantir an ta, pa khawmin a nau inmantir bawk a tih; nauhai khawmin an nu le pahai do an ta, insukhlumtir bawk an tih.
Keia hming leiin mi po po theida nîng in tih; nisienlakhawm, a tâwp chena tuor pei chu, chu ngei chu sandamin um a tih.
“Chuongchun, hi khuoa hin an suknawmna pha cheu, khaw dangah tlân san ro; titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Mihriem Naupa a hung hmain Israel khuohai chu fang suok naw ti niu.
“Inchûktir a inchûktirtu chung- ah a um nawh; suok khawm a pu chungah a um bawk nawh.
Inchûktir chu inchûktirtu anga a hung um le, suok chu a pu anga a hung um chu a hun deh. In neitupa hman Beelzebub an ti chun, a sûnghai chu an va ti nasa awm deh e!
“Chuongchun, anni chu ṭi naw unla; inlang lo dinga thup hmang iengkhawm a um si nawh a; hriet naw dinga ip iengkhawm a um bawk nawh.
Inthima ka hril cheu hi varah hril ro, na bula in hriet hi in chunga chuongin tlânginsampui ro.
“Chun, taksa sukhluma thlarau sukhlum thei nawhai chu ṭi naw unla, Hremhmuna thlarau le taksa sukbo thei ruok chu ṭi ro.
Chawngzawng pahni dâr tang- ka pakhatin an zawr hlak a ni naw am a nih? nisienlakhawm, anni laia pakhat khawm in Pa boin hnuoiah tla naw ni.
In samzai chen khawm hi tiem vawng a nih in sawnnaw.
Chuleichun, ṭi naw ro; chawngzawng tamtak nêkin in hlu lem a nih.
“Chuongchun, mihai hmaa a mi ṭan taphawt chu, ka Pa vâna mi hmaah ṭan vêng ka tih.
Nisienlakhawm, tukhawm mi- hai hmaa a mîn phat taphawt chu, ka Pa vâna mi hmaah inphat vêng ka tih.
“Khawvêla hin inremna inlêng- tir dinga hung am ka nih mi sâwn naw ro; inremna inlêngtir dinga hung ka ni nawh a, kâwlhnâm inlêngtir dinga hung ka ni lem.
Mi a pa indotir dingin, naunu a nu indotir dingin, mo le a pi indotir dinga hung ka nih in sawnnaw.
Mi a hmêlmahai chu ama sûnghai laia mi ngei nîng an tih.
“Tukhawm a nu amanih, a pa amanih keia nêka hmangai lem chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh; tukhawm naupa amanih, naunu amanih keia nêka hmangai lem chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh.
Tukhawm a kraws puta mi zui naw chu ka mi ni tlâk a ni nawh.
Tukhawm a hringna hmu chun chân a ta; keia leia hringna chân chun hmûng a tih.
“Tukhawm a lâwm cheu chu a mi lâwm a na, tukhawm a mi lâwm chu, a mi tirtu lâwm a nih.
Tukhawm zâwlnei chu zâwlnei a ni leia lâwm chun, zâwlnei lâwmman hmûng a tih; tukhawm mi fel chu mi fel a ni leia lâwm chun mi fel lâwmman hmûng a tih.
Chun, tukhawm hieng mi chîn- tak laia pakhat kuoma hin, tirko a ni leia tuisik no khat chau khawm pe taphawt chun, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, a lâwmman chu chân naw tawp a tih,” a ta.
